title: MNF
author: MNF
content: Hi,I'm selling a BC.GAME (Diamond SVIP11) SV11 account, on the way to SV12 the account is well known within the gambling community for being a highroller. I have wagered over $24 million in cryptocurrencies won close to $1 million but gave most of that back to the casino.(Something that most gamblers unfortunately do). Reason for selling the account is simply because I want to quit, it's not as exciting anymore as when I started.I will sell the account, including full access to the registered e-mail account (or when password reset is needed). Furthermore you will receive the contact details of your own VIP Host who can help you with any questions, lossback bonusses or anything else. Note: My account is not KYC'd so you can get that done when necessary, I can provide the transcation history to proof that huge deposits / withdrawals are working instantly.  Code:[b]You will get the full benefits of owning a Diamond Card (Invincible Challenger) account.[/b][b]Exclusive VIP Host [/b]- "There will be exclusive host for every VIP. Feel free to contact them any time."You will receive my personal VIP host's Telegram contact details, and you will be able to ask for your conspicuous weekly bonuses (guaranteed if you wager over $1000 in a single week), or personalized refund bonuses in case you lose a lot.[b]Secret Treasure[/b] - "VIP needs more Surprises in life. The higher your rank, the more surprising your secret treasure will be!"Leveling up on BC.game means getting your hands on juicy bonus rewards, including a BCD (in-house currency pegged to USDT and fully swappable to any other currency) prize, and JB coins to try out games for free, boost Rakeback, and remove withdrawal fees. The account includes over 7.5 million JB coins. While you may find rewards up until Diamond level not being very satisfactory, rewards from now on will be huge.[b]Free Coins Every Day [/b]- "BC.GAME offers many ways to get free coins to all our players. As a VIP you are entitled to an ever growing percentage boost of free coins."You will have granted free access to any way of receiving free coins every day on BC.game. As a Diamond account, you will be able to spin the fortune wheel once every 24 hours at the highest level (MEGA spin) and get free, fully redeemable, and withdrawable top prizes even without betting, ranging from 5 locked BCD to the awesomeness of 5 BTC.You will have access to the top level of the RakeBack program, meaning you will get back a whopping 15% on bets you place (whether you win or lose), increasable to 20% with the JB coins in the account. Redeemable every 30 minutes.You will have access to a generous Daily recharge in any currency you like, and you can also choose to redeem it hourly or every 10 mins.You will have the chance to catch Coco, the mascot of the website, at least 3 times a day, and you will be getting a reward proportional to your level, which means more than $2.2 free BCD every time you catch him!You will have the chance to redeem shitcodes offered by the website or by other users for free coins, get random rain from the chatroom, and catch coindrops from other users.You will be able to play the Roll Competition and spin your number once every day, to win a reward in DOGE.You will also have the chance of collecting locked BCD and slowly unlock them the more you bet, for additional free coins.Lastly, you have all the chances to get your rewards by collecting medals, ranging from 20 BCD to 10000 BCD. The account is on its way to its first medal prize, only 1 medal left.The SVIP Code - "Only SVIP can get code from exclusive host. Become an SVIP, rock like a superstar and have the spotlight shining on you!"SVIP's Genie In A Bottle - "We’re rolling out the red carpet for you! Your SVIP Manager is now your private Genie ready to grant your wishes. Within reason, of course."SVIP Trip - "SVIP Secret Treasures will fullfill your wildest dreams. You can receive exciting all-expense-paid trips to the most exotic and entertainment filled locations on the planet. Or maybe even something better."SVIP Life Is Suite - "Casinos have the most elegant hotel suites in the world. Indulge yourself with a full week of celebrity treatment including spas, room service, shows and jacuzzis. On us."SVIP Party - "SVIP members will be chosen every year to attend our SVIP Annual Party where you will be treated as the celebrity you are! Get ready for champagne, fine dining and red carpets!"As you can see, you will have access to a wide range of commodities, both in-game and in real life, a chance to get recognized by the community and enjoy luxury dreams.Please message me with your bids, and the highest bid will win this account.I'm not asking 100k like some other sellers, rather give someone the opportunity to make an offer for a reasonable price (aiming at like 2500$ max or highest bid). Payments are accepted in BTC and ETH or any other common currency.DISCLAIMER:for privacy reasons account details will not be shared to anyone other than the final buyer. Feel free to contact me if you have any questions!
